text: The University of Latvia is an independent public university in Riga, Latvia. It was started in 1919, although the library was started in 1524, and Riga Polytechnic started in 1862. In 2022 there were 15250 students - 10,994 were women. 1021 were from other countries. ==References== Category:Riga Latvia Category:Organizations based in Latvia Category:1919 establishments in Europe Category:20th-century establishments in Latvia
title: University of Latvia
